Boundless Pass, Express Cards & Day Tickets

info.title: Comes preloaded with a lift ticket for your first day
info.subTitle: Then save $15 off the daily lift ticket rate each visit
info.desc: Card is linked to your credit card. There is no need to return to the ticket window, just go directly to the lift on your next visit.

disclaimers.text: *Prices do not include taxes and caf fees

info.title: Our most expensive and least flexible option
info.desc: If you are looking for a daily ticket we recommend an express card

info.title: Ideal for intermediate to advanced skiers or boarders
info.subTitle: We have a wide variety high performance Men’s and Women’s All-Mountain, Powder and Carving skis or All-Mountain boards
info.desc:
Ski Package includes demo skis, All-Speed Boots and poles.
Snowboard Package includes demo board and Burton Boa boots.

info.title: Ideal for beginner to intermediate skiers or boarders
info.subTitle: Skis have a neutral flex with an easy turn radius. Snowboards feature a beveled base that’s perfect for gradual edge-to-edge turning.
info.desc:
Ski Package includes Rossignol Experience skis, standard ski boots and poles.
Snowboard Package includes Burton LTR snowboard and standard snowboard boots.

info.title: Ideal for young skiers or boarders
info.subTitle: Skis have a neutral flex with an easy turn radius. Snowboards feature a beveled base that’s perfect for gradual edge-to-edge turning.
info.desc:
Ski Package includes Rossignol Experience skis, standard ski boots and poles.
Snowboard Package includes Burton LTR snowboard and standard snowboard boots.

Our Itty Bitty private is intended for children 6 and under. This product is intended as an introduction to the winter riding experience and is completely paced off of the participant. This is a great choice for kids who may not want a two-hour lesson, and are timid to just dive right in. We intend this lesson to be a safe, fun, and exciting way to engage into Snow Sports. It is also a great resource for parents to offer their children a refresher lesson to work out the kinks of just getting back on the hill. This product includes a complimentary lift ticket.

Participants will receive private instruction by one of our PSIA/AASI Certified Instructors. This lesson is a great choice for the first timer, working a specific skill set, or a thorough exploration of effective movements and tactics to be able to overcome challenging terrain on the mountain. The intent of a two-hour lesson is to have enough time to safely introduce new principles and have and adequate amount of time to work through the fundamentals with the guest. This lesson is intended for all participants regardless of ability level.

A standalone experience, this is the product we think is a great rider experience. When fundamentals and learning progressions are instilled, it is important to give the client time to practice and incorporate all that has been introduced into real riding applications. The three-hour private experience offers great opportunity to learn and practice new skills and the extra time gives guests the time to hone their newly acquired movement patterns.

This lesson type is for all ages. Geared towards the participant that wants to go out and ski with an instructor all day. This lesson is offered at 9:00 a.m. & 10:00 a.m. to make sure the participant can get all 6 hours intended. This is a wonderful opportunity for skiers and riders interested in having instructors with them the entire time they are on the mountain. Working on a variety of turns, tactics, and skills that will increase the participants knowledge and understanding of riding effectively.
